news.title: Musk says he does not support a merger between Tesla and xAI but backs investment
news.summary: Elon Musk owns X, xAI and Tesla and is contemplating the future business relationship between them all. Elon Musk owns x, x AI and Tesla.

news.title: Bitcoin surpasses $120,000 to record highs ahead of U.S. lawmakers' 'Crypto Week'
news.summary: Bitcoin extends a rally to rise to a new record above $120,000 on Monday. The rise was fueled by a rally in bitcoin ETFs and

news.title: Federal Reserve quietly responds to Trump administration attacks over renovation
news.summary: The central bank is quietly pushing back with a new "Frequently Asked Questions" page on its website. The page defends the central bank's renovation.

news.title: Athlete-backed Jams takes on peanut butter and jelly, protein craze
news.summary: Athlete backed Jams hopes to capitalize on the peanut butter and jelly craze. Jams is a brand of peanut butter, jelly and jelly products.

news.title: He bought a side table from Mexico. Tariffs added a surprise $1,170 fee at delivery
news.summary: Businesses typically pass tariff costs onto consumers through higher prices. Sometimes, that process is less subtle. Businesses typicallyPass tariff costs on to consumers throughHigher prices.

news.title: ‘I’m in California and plan to stay here’: I’m 61, lost my job and live off my $425K IRA. My house has $650K in equity. Do I sell?
news.summary: “A very stressful year-long job search yielded less than satisfactory results,” she said. “I’m very happy to be back in the U.S.”

news.title: AstraZeneca shares show signs of life after successful trials of hypertension drug
news.summary: Baxdostat trials showed immense promise for huge available market. Bax dostat is being developed by the Swiss drug company Novo Nordisk.

news.title: Not just the taco trade — why stocks should be resilient to tariff news, says Morgan Stanley
news.summary: The U.S. investment bank goes through the reasons why the stock market keeps rising as new and higher tariff levels get announced. The bank says there are a number of factors that are behind the recent stock market gains.

news.title: Treat your credit score with the respect you would treat a lover
news.summary: FICO has said it will introduce “buy now, pay later’ loan data into its credit-scoring models. FICO will use loan data to help improve credit scores.

news.title: Here’s why this is a golden age for banks — but some of their stocks may be too high
news.summary: Most big bank stocks appear fully valued, based on analysts’ price targets. While there are some exceptions among the 20 largest banks, most are fully valued.
